languages.text: {n}Ваш {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}острый ум{/d} легко отыскивает в недрах памяти куски проповедей Надин Алейников. В них раз за разом она безжалостно обличала слабость тех, кто верует в Императора, но не способен превратить веру в дело. Вероятно, этот порок она ненавидела больше прочих.{/n}

{n}Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}sharp mind{/d} quickly scours the recesses of your memory for any fragments of Nadine Aleynikov's sermons. You recall that she mercilessly denounced the weakness of those who have faith in the Emperor but are incapable of translating that faith into deeds. She must have despised this shortcoming of the soul more than any other.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dein {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}scharfer Verstand{/d} stöbert in deiner Erinnerung rasch nach Fragmenten der Predigten von Nadine Aleynikov. Du erinnerst dich, dass sie unerbittlich die Schwäche von Leuten angeprangert hat, die an den Imperator glauben, aber nicht in der Lage sind, ihren Glauben in Taten umzusetzen. Sie muss diese Unzulänglichkeit der Seele mehr als alle anderen verachtet haben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}sharp mind{/d} quickly scours the recesses of your memory for any fragments of Nadine Aleynikov's sermons. You recall that she mercilessly denounced the weakness of those who have faith in the Emperor but are incapable of translating that faith into deeds. Du erinnerst dich, dass sie unerbittlich die Schwäche von Leuten angeprangert hat, die an den Imperator glauben, aber nicht in der Lage sind, ihren Glauben in Taten umzusetzen. Sie muss diese Unzulänglichkeit der Seele mehr als alle anderen verachtet haben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}esprit aiguisé{/d} fouille rapidement les recoins de votre mémoire à la recherche de fragments de sermons de Nadine Aleynikov. Vous vous souvenez qu'elle dénonçait sans pitié la faiblesse de ceux qui ont foi en l'Empereur, mais qui s'avèrent foncièrement incapables d'agir au nom de cette foi. Elle devrait mépriser cette faiblesse d'âme plus que toute autre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}sharp mind{/d} quickly scours the recesses of your memory for any fragments of Nadine Aleynikov's sermons. She must have despised this shortcoming of the soul more than any other.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tu {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}aguda mente{/d} registra tu memoria en busca de fragmentos de los sermones de Nadine Aleynikova. Recuerdas que denunció despiadadamente la debilidad de quienes, creyendo en el Emperador, eran incapaces de convertir su fe en acciones. Debía de despreciar esta carencia del alma por encima de cualquier otra.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}sharp mind{/d} quickly scours the recesses of your memory for any fragments of Nadine Aleynikov's sermons. You recall that she mercilessly denounced the weakness of those who have faith in the Emperor but are incapable of translating that faith into deeds. She must have despised this shortcoming of the soul more than any other.{/n}

Debía de despreciar esta carencia del alma por encima de cualquier otra.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}明晰な頭脳{/d}は、ナディン・アレイニコフの説教の三辺がどこかにないか、記憶の奥底を素早く探し回る。彼女は皇帝への信仰を持ちつつも、その信仰を行動に移せない者たちの弱さを容赦なく糾弾したことを思い出す。彼女はこのような魂の欠点を、他の誰よりも軽蔑していたに違いない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}sharp mind{/d} quickly scours the recesses of your memory for any fragments of Nadine Aleynikov's sermons. You recall that she mercilessly denounced the weakness of those who have faith in the Emperor but are incapable of translating that faith into deeds. She must have despised this shortcoming of the soul more than any other.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}明晰な頭脳{/d}は、ナディン・アレイニコフの説教の三辺がどこかにないか、記憶の奥底を素早く探し回る。彼女は皇帝への信仰を持ちつつも、その信仰を行動に移せない者たちの弱さを容赦なく糾弾したことを思い出す。彼女はこのような魂の欠点を、他の誰よりも軽蔑していたに違いない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}敏锐的头脑{/d}迅速搜索起了记忆深处，寻找纳迪恩·阿列尼科夫布道的相关片段。你回想起来，她曾无情地谴责了那些软弱的人，谴责他们空有对帝皇的信仰，却无法诉诸任何行动。对她而言，这一定是她最无法容忍的缺陷。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}sharp mind{/d} quickly scours the recesses of your memory for any fragments of Nadine Aleynikov's sermons. You recall that she mercilessly denounced the weakness of those who have faith in the Emperor but are incapable of translating that faith into deeds. She must have despised this shortcoming of the soul more than any other.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}敏锐的头脑{/d}迅速搜索起了记忆深处，寻找纳迪恩·阿列尼科夫布道的相关片段。你回想起来，她曾无情地谴责了那些软弱的人，谴责他们空有对帝皇的信仰，却无法诉诸任何行动。对她而言，这一定是她最无法容忍的缺陷。{/n}

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}Keskin zekânla{/d} hafızanın gerilerinde kalan yerleri tarayarak Nadine Aleynikov'un vaazlarına dair parçalar arıyorsun. Hatırladığın kadarıyla İmparator'a inanan ancak bu inancını eyleme dökmekten âciz olanların zayıflığını acımasızca kınıyordu. Ruhun bu kusurundan, diğerlerinden olduğundan daha fazla nefret etmiş olmalı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}sharp mind{/d} quickly scours the recesses of your memory for any fragments of Nadine Aleynikov's sermons. You recall that she mercilessly denounced the weakness of those who have faith in the Emperor but are incapable of translating that faith into deeds. She must have despised this shortcoming of the soul more than any other.{/n}
